section:
The chapel to Tyrnai is built in the shape of a spear with a long, pillared nave, and an altar at the far end. Tyrnai is depicted here in his aspect as a chivalrous knight, bedecked in golden armour. The priest is a high-ranking bishop, sent from Golnir to aid the High King.
